txt.en: Shakfut is currently leading Ugrukh么r's troops in this area. He has been able to prevent his forces from pushing towards Gothmog's encampment on the western side of the Circle of Wrath.\n\nYou should drive off Shakfut and defeat his most loyal warriors.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. With Shakfut driven away, these Orcs may push on Gothmog's forces and give us just the opportunity we need!'
You have driven away Shakfut and his most loyal supporters.\n\nYou should return to Dolenthol and inform him of your victory.
Shakfut has fled from the area!

'Greetings, [placeholder]. Our time is short but we have an opportunity to destabilize Ugrukh么r's forces.

'Ugrukh么r's captain is an Orc named Shakfut, and he, it seems, is the only creature with leadership enough to keep his warriors in check. If something were to happen to him, well, who can say what the others might do?'

'You should drive off Shakfut and defeat his closest supporters.'
Shakfut is in command of Ugrukh么r's troops in Zhar Skator, west of Barad Angarth. If he is driven off, the remaining forces might push towards Gothmog's troops.
